title: Did Rahul Gandhi cut Manmohan Singh's birthday cake? Old, unrelated video viral
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim:
A video of Rahul Gandhi cutting a cake with Manmohan Singh is viral on social media with the claim that Gandhi did not let the former PM cut his own birthday cake. Singh’s birthday is today, September 26. Among those who shared the video was Rishi Bagree who wrote, “#ManmohanSingh is not even free to cut his own cake.” The video has been viewed over one lakh times and has nearly 7,000 likes.

Shefali Vaidya also tweeted the video saying, “MMS doesn’t even have the authority to cut his own birthday cake before@RahulGandhi leads his hand! Imagine how he ‘ran’ the govt for 10 years!!“

The clip has also been circulated on Facebook. From the page ‘Arnab Fan Club‘ it has received 27,000 views.

It is, in fact, viral on Facebook.

Incidentally, the same video was tweeted by Bagree in 2018 as well.

This video was uploaded by the official page of Congress on December 27, 2018, on the occasion of the party’s foundation day.

The video was also reported by the media.

An old video of Rahul Gandhi and Manmohan Singh was shared on social media to claim that Gandhi did not allow the former PM to cut his birthday cake.
